data.quote: An ounce of practice is better than tons of teaching.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: The trouble is you think you have time.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: The more real you get, the more unreal the world gets.
data.author: John Lennon

data.quote: Decide that you want it more than you are afraid of it.
data.author: Bill Cosby

data.quote: Don't give up, Today is hard. Tomorrow will be worse. Day after tomorrow will be sunshine.
data.author: Jack Ma

data.quote: If you don't give up, you still have a chance.
data.author: Jack Ma

data.quote: The only way to work is to love what you do.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: Be stubborn about your goals, and flexible about your methods.
data.author: Author Unknown

data.quote: A dream becomes a goal when action is taken toward its achievement.
data.author: Bo Bennet

data.quote: The goal is not to get rich. The goal is to live rich.
data.author: Darren Hardy

data.quote: You can’t go back and make a brand new start. But, you can start now and make a brand new ending.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: Today, figure out what makes you happy and do more of it. Figure out what doesn't and do less of it.
data.author: Mandy Hale

data.quote: Dont let someone else’s opinion of you become your reality.
data.author: Les Brown

data.quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
data.author: Oprah Winfrey.

data.quote: Success does not come to you, you go to it.
data.author: Marva Collins.

data.quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
data.author: Winston Churchill.

data.quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for ordinary.
data.author: Jim Rohn.

data.quote: If you want to shine like a sun, first burn like a sun.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing.
data.author: Helen Keller.

data.quote: Failure is an opportunity to begin again more intelligently.
data.author: Henry Ford.
